title: RIISE
description:
RIISE is a B2B data company that transforms millions of real estate datasets into AI-driven insights, enabling businesses to predict, strategise & interact with data at scale.

• Big Data API: Providing businesses worldwide with proprietary datasets & AI-driven insights through a seamless API.

• AI Agent: Powered by millions of unique datasets, RIISE's AI Agent transforms complex data into actionable insights for teams, driving revenue growth, financial strategies, & sustainable development.
